frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-orange-share
frozen.shortDescription: A small python server that accepts requests from an apple shortcut to allow sharing all sorts of media from iOS. It allows sending content right from the share sheet - similar to AirDrop between Apple Devices
frozen.longDescription: A small python server that accepts requests from an apple shortcut to allow sharing all sorts of media from iOS. It allows sending content right from the share sheet - similar to AirDrop between Apple Devices
